name: Lucky Harith
descriptions: Lucky Harith is a caravan merchant and weapon dealer in the Capital Wasteland in Fallout 3.
Harith considers himself a "student on the path of the wasteland," providing safety to wanderers through his trading of weaponry.

Like all caravan merchants in the Capital Wasteland, Lucky Harith's route takes him to Canterbury Commons, the Temple of the Union, Agatha's house, Paradise Falls, Arefu, Evergreen Mills, Megaton and Rivet City.
detailed_location: Loops throughCanterbury Commons,Temple of the Union,Agatha's house,Paradise Falls,Arefu,Evergreen Mills,Megaton, andRivet City

topics.topic_text: Tell me about your trade caravan.
topics.response_text: See, the world's a dangerous and unbalanced place. So I realized, the only way to bring peace was to make sure that everyone could be dangerous!
It's my pleasure to offer hot death in a variety of exciting flavors - take your pick!

topics.topic_text: Can you repair something for me?
topics.response_text: Easy. I've got a knack for this sort of thing, you know!
Ah, a fellow student on the path of the Wasteland! Welcome to my humble caravan. Please relax, for we are in a place of safety!

conversation.response_text: Keep your skills sharp and your eyes peeled, alright?
Here to pick up a few of my marvelous toys?
